jmath

Class JStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmath.JStats

  • public class JStats
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class for various statistical operations

    • Method Summary

      • weightedAverage

        public static double weightedAverage(double[] values,
                                     double[] weight)
        Returns the weighted arithmetic average of the values provided, weighted by the weights provided. The weights to not necessarily need to sum to one.
        Parameters:
        values - the values for the average
        weight - the weights assigned to the values
        Returns:
        the calculated weighted average

      • standardDeviation

        public static double standardDeviation(double... values)
        Calculates the standard deviation of the values array. This method is equivalent to taking the square root of the result from jmath.JStats.variance(double... values)
        Parameters:
        values - the array on which to calculate
        Returns:
        the standard deviation of the array

      • covariance

        public static double covariance(double[] xValues,
                                double[] yValues)
        Calculates the covariance between the two provided values arrays.
        Parameters:
        xValues - the first values array
        yValues - the second values array
        Returns:
        the covariance between the arrays

        Returns:
